item.description:
The usual. We play non-competitive, all inclusive Ultimate Frisbee in the dark. We'll throw around/chat until we get enough people to play, and then we'll get a game (or two or three) going. Afterwards -- 9 or 9:30ish -- we go out for food and drinks.

Unless you like sitting around in wet, muddy clothes -- which is cool if you do, we don't judge -- it's probably a good idea to bring a change of shoes and socks (and pants if you tend to fall a lot).
item.how_to_find_us: We're the only crazy ones playing outside in February. And we've got cool light-up frisbees!
item.why: It's Tuesday night, what else are you doing?
item.name: TGI... Tuesday!
